'''Beautifully-Wrapped Gift Box''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained upon completing {{Quest|Reunion}}. If the player already has one in your inventory upon completing the quest, they will not receive another.

After finishing any [[Hangout Event]] route that branches from Reunion with this item in the inventory for the first time, it transforms into the [[Furnishing]] [[Mysterious Lamp of Fate Ordained]]. Ending the hangout event without completing it leaves the item in the inventory.
